H3.text: Which World War 2 American general was known as 'Vinegar Joe'. Stilwell

A4.text: Joseph Warren "Vinegar Joe" Stilwell (19 March 1883 â€“ 12 October 1946) was a United States Army general who served in the China Burma India theater during World War II.

A5.text: Stilwell is often remembered by his sobriquet, "Vinegar Joe," which he acquired as a commander at Fort Benning, Georgia.
